name: Volume I
description:
Work in progress Rpg for Windows PC

Download Available on the 1st day of Lightning, 2021 (March 1st, 2021)

The sales for Tales of Arcrath will work as follows
* Upon the release of a new Chapter, goes down (70% to 65%) 5%
* Up until its at 25% off
* On the first of January 2022, goes to normal price ($25)

Note: I had to set an end date
* If I dont have enough chapters by the time the sale is over.. I'll just make a new sale

Upon release of new Volumes, the previous Volume will go down 25% and will stop at a permanent 75% in the original price

For Example: 

at Volume 2 - Vol. 1 goes down 25% 

at Vol 3 - Vol 2 down 25% and Vol. 1 goes down 50%
ect...

https://itch.io/app

CAUTION: be advised that this work focuses on medieval themes and thus, some people may not like what is in the text as it pertains to life relating to archaic times.

RATING: This work is geared for an older audience ages 18+ but may go as far as 16+

If you are under 18 I recommend consulting your guardians about playing the game.

Tales of Arcrath is a complex game mixing  strategy, Retro rpg while trying to achieve a realistic tone/atmosphere as well as authenticity.

Anyone is welcome to play the demo to test the waters and see if it is a game you are interested in investing your time and support this process.

https://arcrath.itch.io/tales-of-arcrath-demo
